body.p:
Nicholasville Ky
Oct. 22nd 1865
Gor T E Bramlett
D Sir
I am acquainted with Benjamin Underwood who Petitions Your Excelency to remit two Judgements of the Jessamine circuit court against him for a violation of the penal laws.

The facts stated in his Petion are true and I believe his determination to reform his habits is cincear. I therefor hope your Excelency may remit said fines, I believe the execise of Execative clemency in his case will be approved of by all acquainted with the facts, and the destitute condition of himself & family --

truly Your
obed Servt
G, S, Shanklin
N B If pardoned Remit to me and I wll see that the legal fees are paid
